item.description: We conduct negative testing on the AUT/API with an intention to prove that the AUT/API will not work.

item.name: E2E API AUTOMATION

item.description:
if CREATE A USER-API  
fails, the over-all test should stop

if CREATE A USER API  
passes, the control should goto the next API VERIFY IF USER IS CREATED-API

if an API fails, let the  
test stop

if an API passes, let the  
control goto the next step/API
